text: after the US and their allies invaded
Iraq and toppled the government of
Saddam Hussein the country exploded into
chaos as Warlords and religious
extremist groups began fighting each
other for power in the vacuum that was
created the US was then forced to occupy
the country for years as they attempted
to suppress the Insurgent groups that
had been emboldened and guess who they
turned to for advice on how to occupy
another country the Israeli military
that's right Israeli officers were
brought in to teach the American
military the lessons they learned from
occupying the West Bank and destroying
the Janine refugee camp in 2002 the US
military would adopt Israel's tactics
setting up assassination teams who
engaged in Israeli style hunter killer
death squad tactics this program was
informly known as the Salvador option
and it saw the US spend $8.3 billion do
creating death squads who could serve
the US's interests these death squads
also benefited from a network of secret
torture Cent centers where the US would
bring insurgents to torture them kind of
self-explanatory lastly the US military
adopted the horrific Israeli tactic of
encircling occupied areas with giant
walls us built these giant walls to
divide Sunni and Shiite neighborhoods
and ended up basically trapping the
populations in little prisons one Iraqi
civilian said Iraq is a prison and now I
live in my own little prison we are
isolated from all other areas we'll be
like the Palestinians and we do not not
accept that so there you have it the US
takes tips on how to occupy other
countries from the masters of occupation
the Israelis who coincidentally helped
lie the American public into this war as
Benjamin Netanyahu went before Congress
in 2002 to claim that Saddam Hussein had
weapons of mass destruction and this
shouldn't be surprising as the US is
always borrowing military techniques and
Technology from the Israelis that they
test on the occupied Palestinians but
this strategy in Iraq only turned more
insurgence against the US once they
found out they were working with Israel
because obviously a lot of Muslim Arab
people in that region don't like Israel
the absolute chaos that the US has
brought to the Middle East over the
years is just astounding you almost
can't wrap your head around it this book
will help though it's called the
management of savagery check it out
